descripcion: An Authentication Bypass by Primary Weakness vulnerability [CWE-305] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiOS 7.6.0 through 7.6.4 may allow an unauthenticated attacker to bypass LDAP authentication of Agentless VPN or FSSO policy, when the remote LDAP server is configured in a specific way. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 8.10 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH

A missing authorization vulnerability in Fortinet FortiAuthenticator 6.6.0 through 6.6.6, FortiAuthenticator 6.5 all versions, FortiAuthenticator 6.4 all versions, FortiAuthenticator 6.3 all versions may allow a read-only user to make modification to local users via a file upload to an unprotected endpoint. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 7.20 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH
CASL Ability, versions 2.4.0 through 6.7.4, contains a prototype pollution vulnerability. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) Pendiente de análisis

An authentication bypass in Ivanti Endpoint Manager before version 2024 SU5 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to leak specific stored credential data. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:H/I:N/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 8.60 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH

SQL injection in Ivanti Endpoint Manager before version 2024 SU5 allows a remote authenticated attacker to read arbitrary data from the database. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 6.50 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) MEDIUM

An issue in mquickjs before commit 74b7e (2026-01-15) allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file to the get_mblock_size function at mquickjs.c. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) Pendiente de análisis

An Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability [CWE-200] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiOS 7.6.0 through 7.6.1, FortiOS 7.4.0 through 7.4.6, FortiOS 7.2 all versions, FortiOS 7.0 all versions, FortiOS 6.4 all versions may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass the patch developed for the symbolic link persistency mechanism observed in some post-exploit cases, via crafted HTTP requests. An attacker would need first to have compromised the product via another vulnerability, at filesystem level. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 5.90 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) MEDIUM

A use of externally-controlled format string vulnerability in Fortinet FortiOS 7.6.0 through 7.6.4, FortiOS 7.4.0 through 7.4.9, FortiOS 7.2.0 through 7.2.11, FortiOS 7.0 all versions allows an authenticated admin to execute unauthorized code or commands via specifically crafted configuration. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 6.70 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) MEDIUM

An Improper Link Resolution Before File Access ('Link Following') vulnerability [CWE-59] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiClientWindows 7.4.0 through 7.4.4, FortiClientWindows 7.2.0 through 7.2.12, FortiClientWindows 7.0 all versions may allow a local low-privilege attacker to perform an arbitrary file write with elevated permissions via crafted named pipe messages. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:H/A:H Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 7.10 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) HIGH

An Improper Verification of Source of a Communication Channel vulnerability [CWE-940] vulnerability in Fortinet FortiOS 7.6.0 through 7.6.4, FortiOS 7.4.0 through 7.4.9, FortiOS 7.2 all versions, FortiOS 7.0 all versions may allow an authenticated user with knowledge of FSSO policy configurations to gain unauthorized access to protected network resources via crafted requests. 10/02/2026 10/02/2026 Vector CVSS:3.1 CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:C/C:L/I:L/A:N Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) 4.20 Gravedad 3.1 Txt Gravedad 3.1 (CVSS 3.1 Base Score) MEDIUM
